forecast.day_comments: Snow.  High near 31. Calm wind.  Chance of precipitation is 90%. Total daytime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
forecast.night_comments: Snow showers and freezing rain likely before 2am, then a chance of snow showers between 2am and 5am, then a chance of snow showers and freezing rain after 5am.  Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. Light west wind increasing to 8 to 13 mph after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 28 mph.  Chance of precipitation is 60%. Little or no ice accumulation expected.  Total nighttime snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible.
